body_html: the targets you are giving to criterion is larger than the number of classes you have. Hence there is an out-of-bounds memory access happening. This is unrelated to your weight decay change. Check that your dataset targets are all between 0 and n-1 where n is the number of classes in your output layer.

body: the targets you are giving to criterion is larger than the number of classes you have. Hence there is an out-of-bounds memory access happening. This is unrelated to your weight decay change. Check that your dataset `targets` are all between `0` and `n-1` where `n` is the number of classes in your output layer.
